hero.title: Admissions
hero.subtitle: Join GEC Barmer for a transformative educational experience

notice.heading: Important Notice
notice.text: Note:- Fill Application form for B.E. / B.tech. Admission for 2024-25 and contact to 9460394649

process.title: Admission Process
process.description: Admissions to B.Tech programs at GEC Barmer are conducted through the Rajasthan Engineering Admission Process (REAP).
process.details: REAP is a centralized admission process for engineering colleges in Rajasthan. Candidates are required to register on the official REAP portal and complete the application process as per the guidelines.

eligibility.title: Eligibility Criteria
criteria: Passed 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the subjects from (Chemistry/Biology/Biotechnology).
Minimum 45% marks (40% for SC/ST/OBC/EWS candidates) in the qualifying examination.
Valid JEE Main score for the current academic year.

helpDesk.title: Admission Help Desk
helpDesk.subtitle: Support
helpDesk.description: Our dedicated admission help desk is available to assist you with all queries related to the admission process.

contact.address: Admission Cell, Administrative Block, GEC Barmer Campus
